name: Watermelon Wagon
description:
Dodge the watermelons that are trying to destroy your wagon.

Catch the remains of various dead watermelons to use as Power Ups:

Slow Melons - Slows down the speed of incoming watermelons.

Melon Shield - Tanks one hit from the watermelons.

Wittle Wagon - Shrinks down the wagon to allow for easier watermelon dodging.

Enter you name to attempt to have your name be among the best watermelon evaders.

(After you type your name in and press Enter, it should update. ReEntering a name will change your name on the Leaderboard)
